TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageUrlEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor

summary.span: 提供用于选择引用图像的 URL 的用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting a URL that references an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，提供的对话框中选择一个 URL 属性，引用映像。 is a that provides a dialog box for selecting a URL property that references an image. ## Examples [!code-cpp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebUITypeEditorsExample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Caption As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取要在选择对话窗口中显示的标题。

span.span: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog window.

value.span: 要在选择对话窗口中显示的标题。

span.span: The caption to display on the selection dialog window.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Filter As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取编辑器的文件名筛选器字符串。

span.span: Gets the file name filter string for the editor.

summary.span: 该字符串用来确定在对话框的文件列表中显示的项。

span.span: This string is used to determine the items that appear in the file list of the dialog box.

value.span: 可用于筛选对话框的文件列表的筛选器字符串。

span.span: The filter string that can be used to filter the file list of the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用两个筛选器选项指定一个筛选器字符串： 一个用于常用映像文件扩展名 （*.gif、 *.jpg、 *.jpeg、 *.bmp、 *.wmf、 *.png），一个的所有文件 (\*。\*)。The property specifies a filter string with two filter options: one for common image file extensions (*.gif, *.jpg, *.jpeg, *.bmp, *.wmf, *.png), and one for all files (\*.\*). 筛选器字符串包含一个或多个筛选器选项。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每个筛选器选项包含说明的筛选器，跟垂直条 (|) 和筛选器模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 由竖线分隔的字符串不同筛选选项。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 以下是包含两个筛选器选项的筛选器字符串的示例:"`Bitmap Files (*.bmp)|*.bmp|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"。The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`Bitmap Files (*.bmp)|*.bmp|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 通过用分号分隔的筛选器模式，可以在筛选器选项中指定多个筛选器模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 以下是第一个筛选器选项指定三种筛选模式的筛选器字符串示例:"`Image Files(*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif)|*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"。The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies three filter patterns: "`Image Files(*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif)|*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
